tips.title: Tips for a successful match
tips.tip1: Choose a popular time (weekday evenings or weekend)
tips.tip2: Give precise details about the location and how to access it
tips.tip3: Be clear about the expected level and atmosphere of the match
tips.tip4: Plan for some equipment (bibs, balls) if possible

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about FootballConnect
faq.q1: How can I cancel my participation in a match?
faq.a1: Go to the match page and click on the 'Leave match' button. Note that organizers cannot leave their own matches.
faq.q2: Are the fields reserved by FootballConnect?
faq.a2: No, FootballConnect is a connecting platform. For paid fields, the organizer is responsible for the reservation.
faq.q3: Can I participate without creating an account?
faq.a3: No, you must create an account to join or create matches. This ensures the security and reliability of the system.
faq.q4: How does payment work for paid fields?
faq.a4: Payment is made directly between participants and the organizer. FootballConnect does not intervene in financial transactions.
faq.a5: Yes, you can create as many matches as you want. It's a great way to build a local community.
faq.q6: Is there insurance in case of accident?
faq.a6: FootballConnect does not provide insurance. We recommend that all players have their own personal insurance.
